Package ie.gmit.dip

Class WordCloud

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.dip.WordCloud
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScriptParsator, WordParsator
public class WordCloud extends Object implements ScriptParsator
Handles Word Cloud related tasks; such getting and setting data required for the word cloud. It controls setting up the source content.
Author:
Maire Murphy

  • Method Details

    • getMaxWords

      public int getMaxWords()
      Get how many words the user want in the output word cloud

    • setMaxWords

      public String setMaxWords()
      Handles getting a valid max words to display (1-30) from the User. Allows user to cancel and return to main menu.
      Returns:
      a flag String to calling method 'CANCELLED' or 'OK'. 'OK' means user set the max value.

    • getSource

      public String getSource()
      Returns the source entered by user (file location or URL)
      Returns:
      Source String

    • setSource

      * Handles getting a source value from the User. Allows user to cancel and return to main menu.
      Returns:
      a flag String to calling method 'CANCELLED' or 'OK'. 'OK' means user set the max value.

    • getDestination

      public String getDestination()
      get output image location & name
      Returns:
      String with output location & name

    • setDestinationPath

      public String setDestinationPath()
      Handles getting a the location where to create word cloud image from the User. Allows user to cancel and return to main menu.
      Returns:
      a flag String to calling method 'CANCELLED' or 'OK'. 'OK' means user set the max value.

    • setDestinationFileName

      public String setDestinationFileName()
      Handles getting a file name for word cloud image from the User. It checks if the User added a 'png' file extension. It combines output filename with the location Allows user to cancel and return to main menu.
      Returns:
      a flag String to calling method 'CANCELLED' or 'OK'. 'OK' means user set the max value.

    • getType

      public Sources getType()
      A type is stored depending on type of source.
      Returns:
      'FILE' or 'URL'

    • setType

      public void setType(Sources type)
      Depending on user choice - the source type is set
      Parameters:
      type - : 'FILE' or 'URL

    • removeIgnoreWords

      public void removeIgnoreWords(Collection<String> igWords)
      Handles each ignore word (if existing in ConcurrentHashMap) being removed - using a Thread for each ignore word.
      Parameters:
      igWords - - read only Collection of ignore words

    • sortContent

      public void sortContent()
      Create a sorted map in descending order based on frequency value from the ConcurrentHashMap uniqueWordsMap using a lambda expression Code integrated from https://www.tutorialspoint.com/how-can-we-sort-a-map-by-both-key-and-value-using-lambda-in-java

    • parseText

      public void parseText(String text)
      Source text for the word cloud is parsed using help methods in the WordParser Interface. The array of strings is then stored in a ConcurrentHashMap.
      Parameters:
      text - : from the source

    • createImage

      public boolean createImage()
      Get top words and trigger word cloud image creation passing in list of top words and save location\png name
      Returns:
      true if the image created successfully
